description: Create a project transport plan event time summary.
permissions: Authenticated user with a persisted account. Results are scoped to the userâ€™s ProjectTransportPlan policy scope unless the user is admin.
side_effects: Server generates a summary from project transport plan event time data; no persistent changes are described.
validation_notes: Server defaults filters to event_kind=actual and has_full_duration=true when not provided. group-by cannot include start_at_confidence or end_at_confidence; invalid values return 400. --filter values must be key=value and key is required; invalid format returns an error. --filters must be valid JSON object. filter[event_date_local], _min, _max must be YYYY-MM-DD parseable dates. filter[broker], [driver], [event_type], [location], [material_type], [plan], [project], [project_transport_organization] must be integer IDs (one or many). filter[plan_status] must be a valid project_transport_plan_status value; invalid values yield no results. filter[event_kind] must match project_transport_plan_event_time_kind (help text lists actual/other). filter[is_app_owned], [is_manual_override], [transport_order_is_managed] are booleans. filter[start_at_confidence_min/max] and filter[end_at_confidence_min/max] must be numeric floats between 0.0 and 1.0 or the API returns 400.

flags.name: --all-metrics
flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be key=value; key is required.

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to event_type unless set.
